Uses of Class
EasyNetworking.library.ServerHandler

  • Packages that use ServerHandler 
    Package Description
    EasyNetworking.library  

    • Uses of ServerHandler in EasyNetworking.library

      Fields in EasyNetworking.library declared as ServerHandler 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ServerHandler EasyMultiThreadedServer.WorkerThread.handler
      This ServerHandler contains all the information required to send and receive data from a Client independently from the ServerSocket.
      protected ServerHandler EasyServerSocket.handler
      ServerHandler is used to hold the information of the input and output and the client Socket
      Methods in EasyNetworking.library that return ServerHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ServerHandler EasyServerSocket.getHandler()
      Used to return handler and allows access to internal output and input streams and client socket data
      Methods in EasyNetworking.library with parameters of type ServerHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void EasyMultiThreadedServer.workerThreadImplementation​(ServerHandler handler)
      This method has to implemented by the user when instantiated an EasyMultiThreadServer.
      Constructors in EasyNetworking.library with parameters of type ServerHandler
